rev.comment: [[WP:RBK|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/88.192.43.147|88.192.43.147]] ([[User_talk:88.192.43.147|talk]]) to last revision by Wyatt Riot ([[WP:HG|HG (Custom)]])
Moved the added line about social networking... moved to end of Para 3. [[wp:LEAD]] - doubtful of mention in the lead at all and I can't see it in Para 1 at all.
probably true, but also original research
Undid revision 359620321 by [[Special:Contributions/110.33.115.236|110.33.115.236]] ([[User talk:110.33.115.236|talk]]) rv unsourced pov
/* Economics */ had weird way to represent an acronym expansion
/* Economics */ clarify what's actually interesting about DKPs
/* System architecture */ better than scare quotes
/* System architecture */ instead of switching to an imprecise term, use the actual term and link to explanation of it
/* Themes */ oh, never mind, it was just promo spam in the first place
erm, this seems to be what would've been meant here
add cite, add cite needed tag, some cleanup, linking, copyediting
excise dead-link cite that had all the reliability inherent to Some Random Guy's Blog in the first place
fix cite (note, Will Wright only wrote the foreword)
/* History */ rewrite, more reliance on published reliable sources rather than one guy's self-published web article, add cites, include Habitat, misc
Move origin of term into the body. This is about the genre, rather than the word itself. Maybe this belongs in the lead as well, but I am dubious.
restore coinage note with cite, modulo UO-popularizing-the-genre bit
"multi-user dungeons" (or domains or whatever personal D) - would generally be considered "multi-user games" - removed redundant redundancy
tighten, and drop "first" - let's leave the religious fight in those articles, please?
